Articles.Content:
Gooood day fellow Kerbanauts!

Hope all is good in the Kerbal Universe

I've been playing KSP for some time now, and could never really get anywhere, but when I did, I never knew what to do.... Until I discovered the forum and all the Einstein replica's therein

I've always found interest in Astronomy and Space travel, but never knew enough to do more (except now, with my own little space sim ).

Currently, I'm only trying to get to the moon, but soon enough, I will put my creative skills at work and start making some models and/or add-ons, as I have quite some experience with 3ds Max, Photoshop and Unity. Might need to have a look at the SDK first though

Well, from a lekker warm summers day in South Africa, I wish you all the best in your endeavors

Keep it lateral

Hallo there hallothere. welcome to the community of space and rocket lovers we call the KSP forums

Squad want to make KSP as accessible to the add-on community as possible, so the sky is the limit with KSP, so it's always great to see new modders here, the things that are possible with the plugin system are just amazing

so the sky is the limit*

*and your launch vehicle

Thanks guys (and/or girls)...

Not only for the replies, but for the great game, and

Squad want to make KSP as accessible to the add-on community as possible

Hallo there! I hope you'll enjoy ksp to the max (there's actually no max according to Jeb).

From a heerlijke warme dag in the Netherlands, I wish you the best! ^^
